resources.string: Calculated hash will be shown here

Hello, my name is Tomas and I am a newbie Android Developer. This application has been created mainly for educational purposes and to teach myself about Android development. This small app will allow you to check the MD5 hash(other hashes are to follow) of a file. I will be updating this application as much as possible. If you notice any bugs, please let me know and I will do all I can to fix them.
